attributes.action: Install a speed camera on Hitchin Road, Arlesey, Bedfordshire.
attributes.additional_details:
I have spoken to a number of residents in the village of Arlesey who feel this needs to be put in place to prevent any further incidents occuring. 
There have been a number of incidents when drivers who are doing to the maximum speed limit of 30MPH are overtaken on the wrong side of the road by drivers who appear to do not seem to care about road safety in our village.
attributes.background: The constant speeding through our village is appauling, there is currently a speed indicator device (SID) showing this village is 30MPH zone however, there is not adhered to in many cases.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Safety on local roads is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
